Resting.synopsis: Small dialogue when you find Liam sleeping in the den after freeing him in the goblin camp.
Resting.how_to_trigger: - goto -73, 16, 356- Use your Illithid powers on the goblin to gain entry- goto 333, 41, -34, pass Charisma Check with Spike to make him leave- Destroy the 'Torture Rack' with Ctrl+Shift+K- Talk to Liam and have him return to the Druid's Den- Trigger and complete 'Plea at the Gate' at (217, 32, 411) using the ReCon command "killcombat"- Speak with Liam at (171, 20, 547)

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Only one session ('Resting') is provided, and it does not have any inherent ordering constraints with other sessions, nor are there any mutually exclusive sessions present. As such, there are no ordering or exclusiveness relationships to specify.

Resting_0.speaker: Narrator
Resting_0.text: *The adventurer sleeps soundly, his breath steady, his wounds expertly bandaged.*
